## ContractEncoder class

Encodes and decodes Contract functions

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class ContractEncoder<TContract extends BaseContract>
```

## Constructors

| Constructor                                                              | Modifiers | Description                                                         |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------ | --------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [(constructor)(contractWrapper)](./sdk.contractencoder._constructor_.md) |           | Constructs a new instance of the <code>ContractEncoder</code> class |

## Methods

| Method                                                     | Modifiers | Description                                       |
| ---------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ------------------------------------------------- |
| [decode(fn, encodedArgs)](./sdk.contractencoder.decode.md) |           | Decode encoded call data for a given function     |
| [encode(fn, args)](./sdk.contractencoder.encode.md)        |           | Encodes the given contract function with argument |
